Package com.xebisco.yield

Interface FontLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwingPlatform
    public interface FontLoader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getStringHeight​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.Object fontRef)
      Calculates the text height based on the font reference gave.
      double getStringWidth​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.Object fontRef)
      Calculates the text width based on the font reference gave.
      java.lang.Object loadFont​(Font font)
      The function loads a font object in Java.
      void unloadFont​(Font font)
      The function unloads a specified font.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFont

        java.lang.Object loadFont​(Font font)
        The function loads a font object in Java.
        Parameters:
        font - The "font" parameter in the "loadFont" method is the font that you want to load.

      • unloadFont

        void unloadFont​(Font font)
        The function unloads a specified font.
        Parameters:
        font - The parameter "font" is a variable of type "Font" that represents a font loaded in memory. This function "unloadFont" is used to release the memory allocated for the font and free up resources used by the font.

      • getStringWidth

        double getStringWidth​(java.lang.String text,
                      java.lang.Object fontRef)
        Calculates the text width based on the font reference gave.
        Parameters:
        text - The text.
        fontRef - The font reference.
        Returns:
        The text width.

      • getStringHeight

        double getStringHeight​(java.lang.String text,
                       java.lang.Object fontRef)
        Calculates the text height based on the font reference gave.
        Parameters:
        text - The text.
        fontRef - The font reference.
        Returns:
        The text height.
